title: HYPERCARRY META isn't fun
body:
I think rito didn't get the memo.. winning your lane and getting objectives for 30 minutes just to get crush by a vayne solo-ing your entire team, not fun rito, not fun at all.


Just fix Thornmail after Worlds, ok?

replies.body: It's not about the hyper carries, kog'maw, karthus, ryze, Cassiopeia, Anivia they are all "hyper carries" but they are not toxic or unfun imo, it's just vayne that is overtuned.

Vayne is just the worst case, the idea of a hypercarry capable of changing the game by dealing absurd amount of damage by itself breaks the concept of "team game". 

But the problem is, once they get to this state, you can't itemize against it. Thornmail is useless now, Frozen Heart doesn't help sht, Sunfire is even worst somehow.
